abstracts.cdata!:
The project would assist the Government
            with project planning and preparation by providing (a) about
            35 man-years of long-term expert services to the PPU and
            operational ministries or other government agencies; (b)
            about 35 man-years of consultant services for feasibility
            studies, design work, implementation and other
            project-related activities; and (c) training of local staff,
            services, equipment, vehicles, supplies and operating costs.
            The project would help the Government achieve the project
            targets set out in the Third National Development Plan
            (1979-83), and would help train a cadre of local staff to
            plan, prepare and implement projects in future years.
